page.title: 13TV Viewing in Eglwysbach
page.content: Television starts in the morning at six thirty with the TVam programme and finishes at about midnight. As soon as I get home, my mum is watching either Young Doctors or Sons and Daughters and then I watch Children's ITV. It is fab on Wednesdays and Thursdays. At six o'clock I watch Brookside on S4C. I like cartoons like Road Runner and Bugs Bunny and comedies like Carry on Laughing but I think drama stories are very boring. The best comedy or film starts at about half past seven to about half past ten. Sport on television is very good as well. I like snooker. My favourite programmes are Coronation Street and East Enders. In our house my mum has always got the television on but I think it is brilliant.
